name: Instamojo Technologies Pvt Ltd.
description: Operator of on-demand payments and an e-commerce platform designed to buy and sell items digitally. The company's platform caters to the end-to-end requirements of merchants, enabling them to showcase their products, collect orders, track sales, connect with customers, schedule shipping, and handle other business functions.
one_liner: Operator of on-demand payments and an e-commerce platform designed to buy and sell items digitally. The company's platform caters to the end-to-end requirements of merchants, enabling them to showcase their products, collect orders, track sales, connect with customers, schedule shipping, and handle other business functions.
